content.item:
HTML CONTENT
This is a dynamic content window with HTML formatted content.

All content in this window can be editted via a single XML file. You can format text using standard HTML tags such as the colour and size of text and also bold italics and underline styles. In the XML you can also define the width and height of this content window and also the border size. You can also add hyperlinks to link to external pages. Hyperlink colour and hover effect can be changed easily by editting a StyleSheet built in the code.

You can also insert images.
